reviews.text: Large well appointed rooms, 32 inch flat screen TVs in each room. Helpful staff. Nice breakfast and evening receptions. The Fitness center is more spacious than other hotels of this style.
reviews.title: Nice Residence Inn but not with some problems

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The cons: I stayed for several weeks and its the weekend housekeeping. One day a person came to take care of my room at 1:00. I asked if she could come back in 30 minutes. She never came back. Another Saturday the housekeepers seemed to be gathering on the second floor with their kids. They were running and yelling up and down the hallways. I think they were all moving together in the same room with their kids room to room.
reviews.title: Comfortable, Clean, Friendly
